resources.string: No special changes are made to die rolls\n

If the first roll fails, you have a second chance to roll again.

Weapons: Glaive, Icy Longspear

If the first roll succeeds, you must roll another successful check or be defeated.

Monster: Giant Hermit Crab

All maximum rolls on this die count as one higher.

Weapons: Heavy Pick, Scythe
For six sided dice, ones count as threes\n

%d for each die rolled

Barrier: Ambush
Location: Waterfront
Monster: Warlord
If you would defeat a bane with the Undead trait here, roll 1d6. On a 1, the monster is undefeated.\n

After a successful check, roll a six sided die. On a 1 your check fails.

Locations: Desecrated Vault, Jorgenfist

After a successful check, roll a six sided die. On a 1 or a 2 your check fails.

Villain: Caizarlu Zerren
